snippet: Mitt Romney answers with a correction: He doesn't own four houses. (He owns three.)
abstract: Mitt Romney answers with a correction: He doesn't own four houses. (He owns three.)
lead_paragraph: TILTON, N.H. - At a spaghetti dinner here over the weekend, Mitt Romney offered his usual stump speech, and his usual applause lines were met with the usual applause, albeit of a slightly lower-energy variety than he encountered last week in Iowa.

headline.main: Voter Asks Romney, Why Not Give Us a House or Two?
